text: Moscow, My Love () is a 1974 Soviet-Japanese movie directed by Aleksandr Mitta and Kenji Yoshida.МОСКВА, ЛЮБОВЬ МОЯ (1974)Смотри и танцуй It stars Komaki Kurihara, Oleg Vidov, and Valentin Gaft. ==Actors== *Komaki Kurihara - Yuriko *Oleg Vidov - Volodya *Valentin Gaft - choreographer *Tatyana Golikova - Tanya *Elena Dobronravova - Elena Nikolaevna *Ivan Dykhovichny - tutor *Oleg Yefremov - doctor *Alex Varlamov - ballet teacher == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1974 movies Category:Japanese movies
title: Moscow, My Love
